getGlobalSearchOptionsForView

public GlobalSearchOptionsDTO getGlobalSearchOptionsForView(java.lang.String application,
                                                            java.lang.String viewId)
Get the GlobalSearchOptions for the passed ViewId, else the default row.

Specified by:
getGlobalSearchOptionsForView in interface FusionSearchAM
Parameters:
application - the application this is for, possibly null.
viewId - the viewId or page id of the current page.
Returns:
a GlobalSearchOptionsDTO (GlobalSearchOptions Data Transfer Object) for the passed viewId, the default if none found els null if there is no default.

processGlobalSearchConfigParams

public void processGlobalSearchConfigParams(java.lang.String moduleType,
                                            java.lang.String moduleKey,
                                            java.lang.String pillar)
Push the module task flow params to the VO. Note that moduleType/moduleKey are required together. If present they will be used instead of pillar. All parameters are optional.

Specified by:
processGlobalSearchConfigParams in interface FusionSearchAM
Parameters:
moduleType - required if moduleKey is supplied.
moduleKey - required if moduleType is supplied.
pillar - pillar to show data for, will include the common pillar.

processGlobalSearchGroupsParams

public void processGlobalSearchGroupsParams(java.lang.String moduleType,
                                            java.lang.String moduleKey,
                                            java.lang.String pillar)
Push the module task flow params to the VO. Note that moduleType/moduleKey are required together. If present they will be used instead of pillar. All parameters are optional.

Specified by:
processGlobalSearchGroupsParams in interface FusionSearchAM
Parameters:
moduleType - required if moduleKey is supplied.
moduleKey - required if moduleType is supplied.
pillar - pillar to show data for, will include the common pillar.
